Description: Bright, Spacious 2BR/1BA in Brighton! This unit features an open floor plan, High ceilings, hardwood floors throughout, and lots of natural light, living/dining room, two large, equal bedrooms with ample closet space, a modern bath, a modern, fully applianced, eat-in kitchen with granite counters and lots of storage, back porch/outdoor space, and laundry on site!
